text: Jin logon ne hamari aayat ko maanne se inkar kardiya hai unhein bil-yakeen hum aag mein jhonkenge, aur jab unke badan ki khaal (skin) gal jaye(gets roasted) to uski jagah dusri khaal paida kardenge taa-ke woh khoob azaab ka maza chakkhein. Allah badi qudrat rakhta hai aur apne faislon ko amal mein lanay ki hikmat khoob jaanta hai
